TopicTitle: Poll - Which current contracts and contract ideas are popular?

Articles.Content:
Poll link, and results.

I was interested to see which contracts were popular, and which ideas were the most liked. While these ideas aren't new suggestions, it's nice to see how people rate them. Some I've collected from other threads.

Resource mining is not what I meant by "drilling" as my drilling is merely a commercial experiment. The reentry heat only applies to the experimental part, and doesn't really have to fail to be a fun test.

I didn't want to add ideas too hard to implement, and ones which would leave flights lagging up the game. Please add your own ideas, expand on any listed, or discuss any part of this list.
